duck: Of or relating to the ordinal number matching the number 0 in a series: the zeroth power of 10.
zeroth definition: being numbered zero in a series.

milestones: British computer scientist's new "nullity" idea provokes reaction from mathematicians

wiki.text:
'0th' or 'zeroth' is an ordinal for the number zero sometimes used under zero-
based numbering, and can refer to: *0th grade, another name for kindergarten
*0th dimension *0th planet, a name for Vulcan (hypothetical planet) *0th United
States Congress, also called the Congress of the Confederation *January 0 or
January 0th, an alternate name for December 31 *The zeroth law of thermodynamics
*Zeroth-order logic *The Zeroth Law, an addition to Isaac Asimov's Three Laws of
Robotics *Zeroth order approximation; see Orders of approximation *Zeroth, the
fastest demo or highest score on a level or episode in ''N'' (video game)
wiki.title: 0th
